member.summary: Event triggered, when some of indicator has been changed.

member.summary: Returns the estimated user capacity of the elevator, based on avg weight, 80 kg, and elevator's maximum weight capacity.

member.name: F:ElevatorSaga.Core.Classes.Elevator.MaxWeight
member.summary: Return the elevator's maximum weight capacity.

member.param: Maximum weight what elevator can lift.

member.name: M:ElevatorSaga.Core.Classes.Elevator.GetCurrentLoad
member.summary: Returns the current weight load of the elevator in percentage.
member.returns: Elevators current load. Min is 0, max is 100

member.name: M:ElevatorSaga.Core.Classes.Elevator.CanUserEnter(ElevatorSaga.Core.Classes.User)
member.summary: Determines if the desired user can enter to the elevator based on user's weight, and elevator's current weight.
member.returns: True if user can enter, false if not
